  html_document: default
  word_document: default

```{r}
library(tidyquant)
library(plotly)
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(dygraphs)
library(lubridate)
library(xts)
library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
altfuel <- read_csv("../data/Alternative_Fueling_Stations.csv") 
alt_fuel <- altfuel %>% 
  filter(!is.na(fuel_type_code)) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(open_date))
alt_fuel$open_date <- as.Date(alt_fuel$open_date, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%M:%S")
class(alt_fuel$open_date)
min(alt_fuel$open_date)
max(alt_fuel$open_date)

alt_fuel %>% 
  group_by(fuel_type_code) %>% 
  count()

cng_total <- alt_fuel %>% 
  mutate(open_date = year(open_date)) %>% 
  filter(fuel_type_code == "CNG") %>% 
  group_by(open_date, fuel_type_code) %>% 
  count() 
bd_total <- alt_fuel %>% 
  mutate(open_date = year(open_date)) %>% 
  filter(fuel_type_code == "BD") %>% 
  group_by(open_date, fuel_type_code) %>% 
  count() 
e85_total <- alt_fuel %>% 
  mutate(open_date = year(open_date)) %>% 
  filter(fuel_type_code == "E85") %>% 
  group_by(open_date, fuel_type_code) %>% 
  count() 
elec_total <- alt_fuel %>% 
  mutate(open_date = year(open_date)) %>% 
  filter(fuel_type_code == "ELEC") %>% 
  group_by(open_date, fuel_type_code) %>% 
  count() 
HY_total <- alt_fuel %>% 
  mutate(open_date = year(open_date)) %>% 
  filter(fuel_type_code == "HY") %>% 
  group_by(open_date, fuel_type_code) %>% 
  count() 
LNG_total <- alt_fuel %>% 
  mutate(open_date = year(open_date)) %>% 
  filter(fuel_type_code == "LNG") %>% 
  group_by(open_date, fuel_type_code) %>% 
  count() 
lpg_total <- alt_fuel %>% 
  mutate(open_date = year(open_date)) %>% 
  filter(fuel_type_code == "LPG") %>% 
  group_by(open_date, fuel_type_code) %>% 
  count() 

fig1 <- plot_ly(lpg_total, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines', fill = 'tonexty')%>%
  add_trace(x = ~open_date, y = ~n, name = 'LPG')

fig2 <- plot_ly(bd_total, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines', fill = 'tonexty')%>%
  add_trace(x = ~open_date, y = ~n, name = 'BD')

fig3 <- plot_ly(cng_total, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines', fill = 'tonexty')%>%
  add_trace(x = ~open_date, y = ~n, name = 'CNG')

fig4 <- plot_ly(HY_total, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines', fill = 'tonexty')%>%
  add_trace(x = ~open_date, y = ~n, name = 'HY')

fig5 <- plot_ly(LNG_total, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines', fill = 'tonexty')%>%
  add_trace(x = ~open_date, y = ~n, name = 'LNG')

fig6 <- plot_ly(elec_total, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines', fill = 'tonexty')%>%
  add_trace(x = ~open_date, y = ~n, name = 'ELEC')

fig7 <- plot_ly(e85_total, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines', fill = 'tonexty')%>%
  add_trace(x = ~open_date, y = ~n, name = 'E85')

fig_total <- subplot(fig1, fig2, fig3, fig4, fig5, fig6, fig7,
               nrows = 4, titleY = TRUE, titleX = TRUE)

```
